body:
<!--
If you are reporting a new issue, make sure that we do not have any duplicates
already open. You can ensure this by searching the issue list for this
repository. If there is a duplicate, please close your issue and add a comment
to the existing issue instead.

If you suspect your issue is a bug, please edit your issue description to
include the BUG REPORT INFORMATION shown below. If you fail to provide this
information within 7 days, we cannot debug your issue and will close it. We
will, however, reopen it if you later provide the information.

---------------------------------------------------
BUG REPORT INFORMATION
---------------------------------------------------
Use the commands below to provide key information from your environment:
You do NOT have to include this information if this is a FEATURE REQUEST
-->

**Description**

`containerd config default` is very useful to check default systemd config, and also get an example of the config file. However, today it doesn't include default plugin config today.

<!--
Briefly describe the problem you are having in a few paragraphs.
-->

**Describe the results you received:**


**Describe the results you expected:**

For CRI plugin, we have many configurations. It would be good to expose the default values in `containerd default config`.

**Output of `containerd --version`:**

```
(paste your output here)
```

@containerd/containerd-maintainers Does this make sense?
title: Include plugin default config in `containerd config default`
